text: 9|18|karpit anak del ksang  ryy thetam vihear robsa a l laoh noh  ku meante anak del mean chomnue leu a l laoh  ning thngai barlok  ning brate b tde sa lat  ning brichcheak hsaa kat  haey ke min kaotakhlach  anaknea krawpi a l laoh bonnaoh .  haey sangkhumtha  anak teangnoh  nung sthet knongchamnaom anak del ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh .
